viewData.name: LG LJ500B 32" Class HD LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy LG LJ500B 32" Class HD LED TV featuring HD 1366 x 768 LED Panel, 60 Hz Refresh Rate for Smooth Motion 2 x HDMI / 1 x USB. Review LG LJ500B
viewData.long_description: Enjoy high-definition content with the LG LJ500B- 32" Class HD LED TV. This 31.5" LED-backlit LCD panel features a native resolution of 1366 x 768, allowing you to view detailed 720p HD images, and the 60 Hz refresh rate helps reduce the blur commonly associated with fast-moving on-screen objects. Its two HDMI inputs will allow you to connect your digital HD sources, such as HD cable/satellite boxes or game consoles.
